attributes.action: Stop increasing the mortgage rate, we can't afford it
attributes.additional_details: The mortgages are going up, already people are struggling, engery bills gone up ect
attributes.background: Stop increasing mortgage rates, but reduce the inflation in a different way

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about mortgage rates are a matter for mortgage providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are struggling to pay your mortgage you can find advice on handling mortgage problems here: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/debt-and-money/mortgage-problems-debt-and-money/
